Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2008 10:08AM maryjaneFL wrote: I want to hear the bad along with the good too! You guys are awesome! Please keep them coming - I KNOW this is so helpful to ME, I know it must be helpful to all the other newly diagnosed ladies (and gents too, if you are reading).  I don't post too much, I tend to withdraw when awful things are going on in my life, please know I am reading every tiny tidbit that gets posted. Thank you!
